title: Piper Meets A Psychopath
overview: Piper the people pleaser is willing to do whatever it takes to avoid saying the word "No".  Bopping around town as a food delivery girl, she makes peoples day!  She's smart, quick, and resourceful; armed with a bright pink fanny pack full of any condiment you could ever ask for. But when the friendly neighborhood psychopath offers her a deal she canâ€™t quite refuse, her hella chill lifestyle might come to a quick end.
